name: Motion Practice
description: Templates for various motion practice billing entries including summary judgment, discovery motions, and procedural motions

templates.description: Draft motion for summary judgment on behalf of [client's name] by analyzing facts, applicable law, and preparing comprehensive brief with supporting evidence.
Draft opposition to plaintiff's motion for summary judgment by identifying disputed material facts and legal issues requiring trial.
Draft motion to compel discovery responses from plaintiff regarding [specific discovery requests] due to inadequate responses.
Draft motion to strike [specific pleading/evidence] as [grounds] pursuant to [applicable rule].
Draft motion to continue [hearing/trial] due to [specific reasons] and coordinate with opposing counsel on new dates.
Prepare for oral argument on [motion name] by reviewing briefs, case law, and preparing comprehensive argument outline.
Research applicable case law and statutory authority for [motion type] to support legal arguments and cite relevant precedent.
